changelog:
Initial release of KernelSU Next Anti-Bootloop & Backup Module

Features:
- KernelSU Next API compatibility with WebUIX framework
- Multi-stage anti-bootloop protection with automatic recovery
- Comprehensive encrypted backup and restoration system
- OverlayFS integration for safe system modifications
- Progressive Web App with Material Design UI
- Boot monitoring and safety features
- Recovery point management
- Cross-device compatibility
- MMRL integration support
author: Wiktor/overspend1

releaseNotes: Welcome to the first release of the KernelSU Next Anti-Bootloop & Backup Module. This advanced module leverages the latest KernelSU Next APIs to provide comprehensive protection against bootloops while offering secure backup capabilities with modern web-based management.
